page.description: Fires after the List is persisted to Local Storage.

argument.name: e
argument.description: An object that contains the following properties:

property.name: success
property.description: Indicates if the data was successfully saved to Local Storage. If *[js:true]*, data was saved. If *[js:false]*, data was not saved.

property.name: mode
property.description: Indicates what List action (e.g. 'populate', 'append', 'update', etc.) triggered the event.
